title: Joe Tinker T206 Bat Off Shoulder Cycle 460

posts.post_title: Joe Tinker T206 Bat Off Shoulder Cycle 460
posts.post_content:
I bought this from a customer who found this in an attic in Vermont today. I see PSA has only graded 3 of these. I cant find much to go by for price, but I am open to offers or price advice. 



[url=https://ibb.co/C6JLK38][img]https://i.ibb.co/C6JLK38/ODFV6085.jpg[/img][/url] [url=https://ibb.co/x6Cbq5b][img]https://i.ibb.co/x6Cbq5b/QJFI4075.jpg[/img][/url]

Vermont! What a surprise! Go VT! I'm gonna call you!

Peace, Mike
Got tied up at the shop today.. Ill catch up with all the messages now

Thank you for an in person seamless transaction! Take care!

Peace, Mike

PS SOLD!

Wow! SGC was fast on this! Sent it in last week! Paid $100 for quick service and got it back today. Thanks again Jeff! 

Peace, Mike
